event.name: Where We Call Home
event.description: We meet American Parker Allen, a Tokyo-based consultant who helps foreigners purchase vacant houses in Japan, and Argentinian-born Komatsu Graciela Ana, who runs a dairy farm in Shibetsu in Hokkaido.
